alert.note: Alert for Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh; Southeast Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HEAVIER SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT CENTRAL RALEIGH AND SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 634 PM EDT, heavier snow showers were located in the vicinity of Interstate 64, moving southeast at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Beckley, Mount Hope, Mabscott, Crab Orchard, Dry Creek, Macarthur, Bradley, Prosperity, Beaver, Daniels, Piney View, Stanaford, Shady Spring, Powellton and Pax. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 37 and 65. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 120 and 135. Route 19 between mile markers 1 and 6. Heavier snow showers will lead to briefly reduced visibilities under a quarter of a mile in some locations. Please slow down and allow for plenty of stopping distance, particularly if on the interstate.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh; Southeast Raleigh
